name: Find These Hidden Colors! Quiz | Wordplay for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: These silk robes are colorful enough for angels to wear.
questions.explanation:
orange.

	...colorful enough fOR ANGEls.... Synonyms for orange include vermilion (vivid orange-red) and melon (the color of cantaloupe pulp).

questions.text: I told Bob, "Lacking paints and brushes makes it difficult to paint colorful paintings."
questions.explanation:
black.

	I told BoB, "LACKing paints..." Synonyms for black include ebony (a dark-colored wood) and inky.

questions.text: Tim asked, "Do you agree, Nora, that it's best to use pale colors to paint a bedroom?"
questions.explanation:
green.

	"Do you aGREE, Nora...?" Calling someone "green" can mean that he or she is young and inexperienced.

questions.text: Exhausted from painting the room in bright colors, I said, "Whew! Hi, Teddy! Are you here to help?"
questions.explanation:
white.

	I said, "WheW! HI, TEddy!" Synonyms for white include snowy and milky.

questions.text: "Neighbors! They're so unpredictable! For example," said my mama, "Gent across the street from us? The one on the corner? He painted his house such a horrible color that it spoils the whole block!"
questions.explanation:
magenta.

	...said my maMA, "GENT Across the street.... Magenta is an intense, dark pink color.

questions.text: There are many colorful drinks to sip in Kathryn's Coffee Shop.
questions.explanation:
pink.

	Drinks to siP IN Kathryn's Coffee Shop. Synonyms for pink include rose and magenta.

questions.text: "I want to win!" called Anna, vying for one of the colorful ribbons arranged on the judges' table.
questions.explanation:
navy.

	"I want to win!" called AnNA, VYing for one.... Navy blue is dark blue. Other synonyms for blue include indigo and periwinkle.

questions.text: Greg Raymer, my cousin, creates colorful birthday cards for everyone in the family.
questions.explanation:
gray & grey.

	GreG RAYmer. Some people call the brain "gray matter." Clouds, seals, and ashes can be gray, too.

questions.text: After she lost her purse, Marilyn's color grew sickly and pale--money is not easy to earn, after all!
questions.explanation:
lemon.

	...sickly and paLE--MONey.... Lemon is pale, bright yellow. Calling someone "yellow" can mean that he is cowardly.

questions.text: Dressed in colorful costumes, the children were clapping and singing old folksongs.
questions.explanation:
gold.

	SinginG OLD folksongs. Precious metals such as gold, silver, copper, and platinum are used to make coins and jewelry.
